revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The Scottish chronicle; or, A complete history and description of Scotland...by the Reverend and learned Mr. Raphael Hollinshead ; in two volumes. (Hector Boece...."
revision.text: Possibly: The Scottish chronicle; or, A complete history and description of Scotland...by the Reverend and learned Mr. Raphael Hollinshead ; in two volumes. (Hector Boece. Scotorum historiae. English; Raphael Holinshed). (Arbroath : Printed by J. Findlay: - and sold by Messrs. Magnay, and Pickering, R. Ogle, J. Roach, London; W. and J. Deas, Edinburgh; A. Wilson, Glasgow, 1805). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1844562~S1
